name: Johnny Silver's Guitar Shooter
description:
Play as Johnny Silver's Guitar in this CyberFunk game, where everything is either trying to kill you, or killed by You. Don't let any CyberPunk stand in Your way, eliminate them in the most badass way with custom combos.

Read the in game tutorial to learn how to play, it's really cool with images and stuff.

::::::::::::::::::::
Music: Dubstep - Bensound
https://www.bensound.com
Support by RFM - NCM: https://bit.ly/2xGHypM
